voice_responses.welcome: Welcome to EduBot! I can help you with student services through voice commands. You can ask about fees, exams, admissions, attendance, parent communication, or learning support.
voice_responses.menu_audio: Here are the main services: One - Student Support and FAQs. Two - Admissions and Enrollment. Three - Attendance and Performance. Four - Exams and Assessments. Five - Fee Management. Six - Parent Teacher Communication. Seven - Learning and EdTech Support.
voice_responses.error: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that clearly. Please try speaking again or send a text message.
voice_responses.processing: Processing your voice message, please wait...
